Text.val: 25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
26.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended DUNI_INVOICENO to alpha 20
23.03.2011 GB SCR116261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
17.01.2008 SH SCR13294 Added TREP_JOURNALNO (segment of PK)
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
06.02.2004 SH SCR5431 Produce only XML if a row where COUT202_REPORTTYPE
- = 'MAH' or 'MAB' exists in COUT for the selected clients
04.02.2004 SH SCR5431 Changed PI.REPORT_TYPE_STRING fro BXA900 to 'MAD' if
- report type of client is 'MAD'
02.02.2004 SH SCR5431 Changed writing of DUNL/DUNI rows to XML, DUNI rows
- will be written now to extra specified new tags, see SCR for details
16.12.2003 SH SCR5049 Write DUNI_LETTER_UPDATED to <dunning_letter> now
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with 0
10.11.2003 SH SCR4692 Removed header if DUNI rows will be written for
- reporttype = MAD
10.11.2003 SH SCR4692 Extended BXA011 with reprottype 'MAD', in this case also
- DUNI rows will be printed to XML
30.05.2003 SH SCR3647 Reduced selection of DUNL row with
- " And DUNL_DUNNINGDATE < GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE"
25.03.2003 SH SCR2276 Replaced table TEMP_REPORT from %TEMP% by
- TEMP_REPORT from %FACTORLINK(TEMP)% and write the Session_ID to table
- this enables a multiinstance using of this temp table
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added to new arguments for GB007 if job is running on
- AS400 to turn job to message wait
12.02.2003 SH SCR2934 Added new SORT (9) for country if COUT202_SEQUENCE = 9
22.10.2002 SH SCR2393 Add new argument to end of list for call to BXA900
22.07.2002 SCR1615 SH extend the selection of DUNNING_LETTER rows with
- DULD_PRINTONDUNNINGSPEC = true if temp file will be written and also
- if the xml report will be created
06.05.2002 SH SCR95 Wrap any output with UFB535, to replace special XML-Charater
06.05.2002 SH SCR759 Implemented errorhandling and a proper handling of
- directories for Templates and Outputfiles
07.03.2002 SH SCR952 Set Allow Event to 'N', all tasks
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling

-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs

-- XML has to be only generated if there is a row in COUT for the selected
-- client with 'MAH' or 'MAD'

-- Build filename for temporary XML Files

-- Debtor: Write debtor part1
-- Invoices: Write additional DUNI rows only if reporttype = 'MAD'
-- Debtor: Write debtor part2
Concatenate the three created XML parts (Part 1- Part 3)
1. Debtor part
-- Build final temp. XML file for BXA011B - Debtor/Invoice
-- Firstable copy the first partial XML file to the traget file, if we don't do
-- that, AS/400 will choose system default fo CCSID (EBCDIC) if we later
-- append with cat >> to a non-existing (new) XML file ...
2. Invoice part
-- Only if DUNI rows were written to XML
3. Debtor end part
-- Final update handled DUNL row

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DUNL_ADMNO,DUNL_CLNTNO FROM :1/DUNL, :1/DULD where DUNL_LETTER=DULD_LETTER and DULD_PRINTONDUNNINGSPEC='Y' and DUNL_PRINTED='Y' AND DUNL_OVERVIEWPRINTED='N' AND DUNL_DUNNINGDATE < ':2' GROUP BY DUNL_ADMNO,DUNL_CLNTNO ORDER BY DUNL_ADMNO,DUNL_CLNTNO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
